channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: PhD in computer science (ABD) and MSc in social anthropologist, I am a Bayesian Data Scientist working on causal reasoning under uncertainty. Currently, I work as a full-time teacher and researcher in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Buenos Aires. My main focus is on the development and implementation of causal Bayesian inference tools. The state-of-the-art skills estimator in the video game industry, which I have published in Julia, Python, and R, is just one example.
